changeSet.author: Supriya, Vinisha

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Initial","Follow-up","Discharge") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Type of assessment");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Type of assessment

changeSet.author: Supriya, Vinisha

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Right","Left") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Dominant side");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Yes to other MSF project","Yes to non-MSF project","No") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Was the patient refered by network physio to other MSF or non-MSF project?");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("1st stage admission to RSP","Further stage admission to RSP","Medical or surgical order","Network physio MBA","Network physio Defaulter","Refused network physio services","Death","Transfer","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Discharge reason, network physio");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Full achievement of all network physio goals","Partial achievement of network physio goals","None of the network physio goals were achieved") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Network physio goals status");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("1 month","2 months","3 months","4 months","5 months","6 months","7 months","8 months","9 months","10 months","11 months","12 months","13 months","14 months","15 months","16 months","17 months","18 months","19 months","20 months","21 months","22 months","23 months","24 months") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Network physio follow-up at");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Passive joint mobilization","Assisted/ active movement","Muscle strengthening","Bone transportation/ lengthening","Weight bearing/ Gait training","Positioning","Prosthesis/ Orthosis/ Hand splint/ Cast","Scar massage/ Silicone + Pressure therapy","Pain management","Electrotherapy/ Ultra Sound therapy","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Physiotherapy prescription");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) From concept_reference_term where `code` in ("164009", "164967", "131022") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where `name` = 'CEIL' and retired =0 );

changeSet.comment: Adding codes to specific concepts

changeSet.author: Vinisha,Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("NP, Date recorded","NP, Type of assessment","NP, Initial Assessment","NP, Functional score","NP, Was the patient refered by network physio to other MSF or non-MSF project?","NP, Referred by network physio to","NP, Network physio feedback to the surgeons","NP, Discharge","NP, Network physio follow-up at","NP, Physiotherapy prescription","NP, Other physiotherapy prescription","NP, Target/ Modalities/ Specifications","NP, Treatment duration of the physiotherapy prescription","NP, Comments","NP, Video Upload") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Network Physiotherapy Assessment");

changeSet.comment: Adding Set Members to Network Physiotherapy Assessment

changeSet.author: Vinisha, Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("NP, Date of admission to network physio","NP, Dominant side","NP, Targeted site and side","NP, Network physio treatment goals","NP, Special case","NP, Special case, other","NP, Notes about network physio special cases") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Initial Assessment");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("NP, Total lower limb sub-score","NP, Total upper limb sub-score","NP, Total Modified Functional Independence Measure","NP, Total core score","NP, Total lower limb score","NP, Total upper limb score","NP, Activity Independence Measure for Trauma") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Functional score");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("NP, Date of discharge from network physio","NP, Discharge reason, network physio","NP, Other discharge reason, network physio","NP, Network physio goals status","NP, Comments on Network physio goals") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Discharge");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Video") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Video Upload");

changeSet.author: Vinisha, Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name ='NP, Network Physiotherapy Assessment' AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'All Observation Templates');

changeSet.comment: Adding set members to all observation templates

changeSet.author: Tarun, Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(cn2.concept_name_id) from concept_name cn1,concept_name cn2 where cn1.name='NP, Target/ Modalities/ Specifications' and cn1.concept_name_type='FULLY_SPECIFIED' and cn1.voided = 0 and cn2.name='Target/ Modalities/ Specifications' and cn2.concept_name_type='SHORT' and cn2.voided = 0 and cn1.concept_id=cn2.concept_id;

changeSet.comment: Renaming Target/ Modalities/ Specifications to Modalities/ Specifications
changeSet.sql: select concept_id into @concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Target/ Modalities/ Specifications" and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and locale = "en" and voided = 0; update concept_name set name ='Modalities/ Specifications' where name ='Target/ Modalities/ Specifications' and concept_name_type='SHORT' and locale = "en" and voided = 0 and concept_id = @concept_id;

changeSet.author: Tarun, Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(cs.concept_set_id) from concept_set cs, concept_name cn1, concept_name cn2 where cs.concept_set = cn1.concept_id and cs.concept_id = cn2.concept_id and cn1.name = 'NP, Initial Assessment' and cn1.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and cn1.locale = 'en' and cn1.voided = 0 and cn2.name = 'NP, Network physio treatment goals' and cn2.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and cn2.locale = 'en' and cn2.voided = 0;

changeSet.comment: Remove Network physio treatment goals from Initial Assessment

changeSet.author: Tarun, Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(cs.concept_set_id) from concept_set cs, concept_name cn1, concept_name cn2 where cs.concept_set = cn1.concept_id and cs.concept_id = cn2.concept_id and cn1.name = 'NP, Network Physiotherapy Assessment' and cn1.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and cn1.locale = 'en' and cn1.voided = 0 and cn2.name = 'NP, Network physio treatment goals' and cn2.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and cn2.locale = 'en' and cn2.voided = 0;

changeSet.comment: Add Network physio treatment goals to network physiotherapy assessment form

changeSet.author: Bindu

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name='Lower Jaw' and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NP, Targeted site");
